name: h3
description: The Dove Tail G27S ProXR Signature Series Baseball Bat is expertly crafted for professional player Giancarlo Stanton, featuring the innovative ProXR Epic2 patented knob. This unique design includes a smaller, angled knob that reduces pressure on the hamate section of the hand, enhancing comfort and control. The bat is slightly end-loaded with a thin handle, providing an incredible amount of whip for powerful swings. Its all-black finish with a textured sand shark design ensures a sleek appearance, while the cupped ends offer optimum balance and weight differential. Ideal for players seeking performance and style, this bat is available in both maple and birch options.
